import { Box } from '@mui/material' import { useState } from 'react' import Rating from '../rating' import WishlistBookCard from '../wishlistBookCard' const FooterBookCard = forwardRef((props, ref) => { return ( <> {props.authors.length > 0 ? <> {props.authors.map((name, i) => {(i ? ', ' : '') + name} )} :

} {props.title} ) }) export default FooterBookCard
